body.name: OPPOSY Bed Pillows for Sleeping 2 Pack Medium Firm, Queen Size Set of 2, Cooling Pillows Hotel Quality with Premium Soft Down Alternative Fill for Back, Stomach or Side Sleepers（Pack of 2）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Premium Comfort: Elevate your sleep experience with our premium pillows. Crafted for ultimate comfort, they are designed to provide the perfect balance between softness and support, ensuring you wake up refreshed and rejuvenated.

High-Quality Materials: Our pillows feature a high-quality microfiber cover that is both soft and breathable, offering a cool and comfortable surface for a good night's sleep. The cover is also easy to clean and maintain.

Versatile Support: Whether you're a side, back, or stomach sleeper, these pillows are designed to adapt to your preferred sleeping position. Their fluffy yet supportive filling cradles your head and neck, reducing discomfort and promoting better sleep.
Durable and Long-Lasting: These pillows are built to last. They are constructed with care to maintain their shape and support over time, so you can enjoy their comfort for the long haul.

Simple Usage Instructions: After receiving your pillows, open the package and gently tap them to help fluff them up. It's recommended to wait for 48-72 hours to achieve the desired level of fluffiness and support. Then, place them on your bed for a night of ultimate comfort and restful sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description Our pillows are a portable and comfortable travel companion. Whether it's a long trip, camping or a lunch break from work, our inflatable pillows provide you with a comfortable sleep experience.
No matter what position you prefer to sleep in, our pillows are designed to meet your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, this is a no brainer
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought those for a friend who didn't have any pillows. I got the chance to open up the package for her and see how great they were. They come very well packed and will grow as you take them off their original package to become firm yet fluffy. The construction is solid, the stems are professionally sewed, the material is comfortable and this felt like a quality item. She has been sleeping on those for a few weeks now and reporting a better sleep and a good support. For the low price-point, this is a great value and would be perfect for a guest bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m very surprised for the price how well these pillows are made and they are super soft, not firm but comfortable enough for a good nights sleep.I do like that they were packaged so that nothing could sneak in but it was a little tough unwrapping them.No smell at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 6 queen sized pillows from Opposy . I highly recommend these pillows. They are soft enough against your head. It took me a little to get used to them (I also want to point out that I sleep with 2 pillows) , like finding my "spot" so to speak but when I did. You don't want to get up cuz ur so comfortable. I did as the directions said as to fluff them up after taking out of the vacuum seal & wait a few days until you use them in order for the pillows to max out to their potential. I did fluff them up throughout those days as well. They are great for the price! They are not the cheapest but not the most expensive either. They seem to be well made with a nice colored lining around them. I would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows arrived well packaged and so far the pillows have been great. I already washed them before using them and they have been very fliffyand comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & very soft
reviews.reviewText: Very squishy and soft pillows! I’m using them currently in a guest bedroom so not sure how well they hold up; for moderate usage they are great. Not firm at all — would describe as very soft. No odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as fluffy as I had hoped .
reviews.reviewText: So I read the reviews and these and another style were almost the exact same, except! The price was a tad bit different. Now I wish I went for the ones that were $22. Instead of these. I bet they'd have been fluffier. But! they are soft. And we're vaccum packed so I'm sure they will fluff up. But still, you can't add more depth to the filling. So when you lay your head on them they aren't fluffy or supportive at all it just sinks. I guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly soft pillows
reviews.reviewText: My search for the perfect soft pillow has ended finally. Everyone is different especially when it comes to comfort but these pillows were truly soft and what I have been looking for after many, many pillows. I immediately ordered a king set (to use as a body pillow). I previously used down pillows but became allergic and I couldn't find a pillow that matched the softness and comfort I needed. The other ones said they were soft but I found them too firm. These look plush and full but so cloud soft when I lay my head down. I love these pillows!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these pillows. At first I thought they were too soft. But they are amazing to sleep on. they adjust to your neck and head. They are the best ever. I may buy another set before they are gone.

I wish I had taken a video. These 2 queen pillows are vacuum packed like sausages! Trying to get them out was a hilarious work out! 🤣 After removal from much plastic, the pancake flat pillows puffed right up and are light and soft. I would definitely buy again. For the first time in months I didn't wake up with a sweaty overheated head. Yay.

I bought one of those expensive memory contour side sleeper pillows with coolant, and after a couple months I started developing pain and stiffness in my shoulders and arms. It increasingly got so bad that I couldn’t lift one arm above my head. Ended up having physio and $700 later on physio the pain and stiffness was just the same. Traced back when this started and wondered if it was my pillow. Swapped my pillows out for these ones and bingo!!!!! After two weeks I’m completely pain free!!!!! These are such soft but with a bit of firmness, easy to adjust around any positions you sleep in and very difficult to get up from in the mornings - so comfy. Best pillow purchase! Go for it! And remember if ever you have new unexplained pain in any part of your body, always trace back to what was newly introduced or changed in your routine. It could be that simple.
Super soft and really comfortable, definitely would recommend these pillows
The quality of the pillows is great, unfortunately, they are so soft that they fold around your head and cover your ears.
For the price, these are amazing pillows. They are big and soft! Recommend 100%
